DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate the long term effect of supplementation of pre- and probiotics in early life in children born by Caesarean Section.
DOC.brief_title: Follow-up Clinical Study to Investigate the Long Term Effect of Supplementation of Pre- and Probiotics in Early Life in Children Born by Caesarean Section (Julius SN Follow-up 1)
DOC.detailed_description: This is an extension of investigation on the long term effect of supplementation of pre- and probiotics in early life in children born by Caesarean Section from an earlier completed study.
DOC.criteria: Participation in the Julius SN study until 16 weeks of age Written informed consent from parent(s) or legally acceptable representatives Investigator's uncertainty about the willingness or ability of the child and parents to comply with the protocol requirements.
